LanguageData.VFEC.Senators.GainFavor: You gain the favor of Senator {0} from {1}.
LanguageData.VFEC.Senators.FavorTip: You will be favored by {0}, who will join your colony. This will activate their associated perk, along with automatically researching their associated project.
LanguageData.VFEC.LightTheBeacon.Desc: Light this beacon to call reiforcements.
